name: AP_CLAIM_IF_INFO_4
description: Overflow table for claim data that can be sent or received by prospective payment systems (PPS) Pricers.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADMIT_DX_FOR_HAC_PROCESSING
columns.description: The admit diagnosis code that was used during hospital-acquired condition adjusted diagnosis-related group processing.

columns.name: ADMIT_MEDICAL_SURGICAL_DRG_FLG
columns.description: Medical/Surgical Flag assigned at admission.

columns.name: ADMIT_RETURN_CODE
columns.description: Return code at admission.

columns.name: BIRTH_WEIGHT_OPTION_USED
columns.description: Birth weight data entry method used during processing.

columns.name: DISCHARGE_DRG_OPTION_USED
columns.description: The discharge diagnosis-related group (DRG) option used during processing.

columns.name: HAC_ADJ_DRG
columns.description: Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) following Hospital-Acquired Condition (HAC) adjusted DRG processing.

columns.name: HAC_ADJ_MDC
columns.description: The MDC following HAC-adjusted APR DRG Processing.

columns.name: HAC_ADJ_MED_SURG_DRG_FLAG
columns.description: Medical or surgical DRG flag following HAC-adjusted DRG Processing.

columns.name: HAC_ADJ_RETURN_CODE
columns.description: Return code following Hospital-Acquired Condition (HAC) adjusted Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) processing.

columns.name: HAC_ADJ_ROM
columns.description: Risk of mortality (ROM) following HAC-adjusted DRG processing.

columns.name: HAC_ADJ_SOI
columns.description: Severity of illness (SOI) following HAC-adjusted DRG processing.

columns.name: HAC_VERSION_USED
columns.description: Hospital-acquired condition version used for processing.

columns.name: HAC_PROCESSING_ICD_VERSION
columns.description: ICD version qualifier used for hospital-acquired condition adjusted diagnosis related group processing.

columns.name: PAYER_LOGIC_INDICATOR_USED
columns.description: Type of payer logic applied during 3M APR DRG grouping.

columns.name: USER_ID_IN
columns.description: Unique identifier for the user, required for processing the claim when using Super Certificates.

columns.name: FINANCIAL_PAYER
columns.description: Classification of the financial payer of the claim.

columns.name: MEMBER_BENEFIT_PLAN
columns.description: Classification of the member benefit plan.

columns.name: PAT_RESPONSIBILITY
columns.description: Amount the patient is expected to pay for the claim.

columns.name: GROUPER_ICD_VERSION_QUALIFIER
columns.description: Specifies the grouper ICD version to use for processing.

columns.name: ACCESS_FEE_AMOUNT
columns.description: Portion of the total claim payment attributed to access fees.

columns.name: AGE_ADJ
columns.description: The decimal representation of the adjustment rate to the claim due to agency defined age considerations.

columns.name: BASE_DRG_ADJ_USED
columns.description: Max of the provider adjuster, age adjuster & service line adjuster.

columns.name: COVERED_COST
columns.description: Portion of the total charges that is represented in cost dollars.

columns.name: DRG_BASE_AMOUNT
columns.description: Initial estimate of portion of claim total payment qualifying as an inlier.

columns.name: DRG_BASE_PAYMENT
columns.description: Portion of the claim total payment paid for claim qualifying as an inlier.

columns.name: HAC_ADJ_PAYMENT_FLAG
columns.description: Indicates whether HAC-adjusted DRG and severity of illness (SOI) logic from the APR grouper was used.

columns.name: OUTLIER_TRIM_POINT_USED
columns.description: Outlier trim point value used to determine outlier threshold.

columns.name: SERVICE_ADJ
columns.description: Amount the relative weight is incremented for a facility.

columns.name: TOTAL_ALLOWED_AMOUNT
columns.description: Payment before withholding & access payment adjustments.

columns.name: TOTAL_NON_CVRD_AMOUNT_USED
columns.description: Non-covered charges used in determining cost of charges.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Portion of total payment attributable to user-defined adjustment values.

columns.name: VARIABLE_COST_FACTOR_USED
columns.description: Variable cost factor value used in cost outlier calculation.

columns.name: WITHHOLDING_AMOUNT
columns.description: Reduction due to Pay for Performance adjustment.

columns.name: CHARGE_OUTLIER_THRESHOLD
columns.description: The dollar amount, in charge dollars, that the claim charges must exceed to determine the claim eligibility for a high cost outlier payment.

columns.name: ADMIT_MDC
columns.description: The Major Diagnostic Category (MDC) at admission.

columns.name: ADJUSTED_EAPG_WEIGHT
columns.description: The Enhanced Ambulatory Payment Group weight after discounting and consolidation.

columns.name: CLAIM_RECORD_TYPE
columns.description: The overall record type for the claim.

columns.name: FULL_EAPG_WEIGHT
columns.description: Weight(s) obtained directly from the weight file before adjustment.

columns.name: RURAL_ADJUSTMENT_FACTOR
columns.description: Line level rural adjustment factor

columns.name: RURAL_ADJUSTMENT_FACT_SEP_BILL
columns.description: Line level, separately billable rural payment adjustment for adult ESRD beneficiaries utilizing ESRD facilities located in rural core-based statistical areas (CBSA) (that are non-urban CBSAs).

columns.name: STATE_PRICING_INDICATOR
columns.description: Indicates the state rules that were used when pricing the claim.

columns.name: STATE_IDENT
columns.description: State ID returned by Prospective Payment System pricer for diagnosis related group pricing.

columns.name: TOTAL_ERRORS
columns.description: Total errors returned in PPS Medicare Code Editor (MCE) editor block.

columns.name: TAXPAYER_IDENT
columns.description: Taxpayer ID Number from outgoing EasyGroup PPS Pricer

columns.name: ALT_PDGM
columns.description: Alternate Patient-Driven Groupings Model (PDGM) from incoming Ambulatory Payment Classification (APC) grouper using EasyGroup PPS Pricer.

columns.name: PDGM
columns.description: PDGM from incoming APC grouper using EasyGroup PPS Pricer

columns.name: ADJUSTED_DRG_WT
columns.description: Adjusted Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) Weight from incoming DRG pricer using EasyGroup PPS Pricer.

columns.name: VAL_CODE
columns.description: Payer Value Code from incoming Ambulatory Code Editor using EasyGroup PPS Pricer.

columns.name: VAL_AMT
columns.description: Payer Value Code Amount from incoming Ambulatory Code Editor using EasyGroup PPS Pricer.

columns.name: ER_REDUCT_FLAG
columns.description: Flag to determine to apply ER payment reduction from incoming APG Grouper using EasyGroup PPS Pricer

columns.name: APL_FLAG
columns.description: Missing Ambulatory Procedures Listing (APL) Flag from incoming APG Pricer using EasyGroup PPS Pricer

columns.name: NPI_USED
columns.description: National Provider Identifier (NPI) used for processing from incoming ECB2 block using EasyGroup PPS Pricer

columns.name: TAXONOMY_USED
columns.description: Taxonomy used for processing from incoming ECB2 block using EasyGroup PPS Pricer

columns.name: FACILITY_USED
columns.description: Facility used for processing from incoming ECB2 block using EasyGroup PPS Pricer

columns.name: PAYSRC_USED
columns.description: Payer ID Used for processing from incoming ECB2 block using EasyGroup PPS Pricer

columns.name: ADMIT_DX_USED_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: The description of the admission diagnosis used.

columns.name: DRG_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: The description of the Diagnosis Related Group (DRG).

columns.name: INITIAL_DRG_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: The description of the initial Diagnosis Related Group (DRG).

columns.name: INITIAL_MDC_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: The description of the initial Major Diagnostic Category (MDC).

columns.name: MDC_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: The description of the Major Diagnostic Category (MDC).

columns.name: SUGGESTED_PRINCIPAL_PX_DESC
columns.description: Description of the suggested principal procedure.

columns.name: ADMIT_DX_HAC_PROCESSING_DESC
columns.description: Description of admitting diagnosis code that was used during HAC Adjusted DRG processing.

columns.name: ADMIT_DRG_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: Description of returned DRG assigned at admission.

columns.name: ADMIT_MDC_DESC
columns.description: Description of the Major Diagnostic Category (MDC) assigned at admission

columns.name: ADMIT_ROM_DESC
columns.description: Description of Risk of Mortality (ROM) assigned at admission.

columns.name: ADMIT_SOI_DESC
columns.description: Description of Severity Of Illness (SOI) assigned at admission.

columns.name: HAC_ADJ_DRG_DESC
columns.description: Description of the HAC adjusted Diagnosis Related Group.

columns.name: HAC_ADJ_MDC_DESC
columns.description: Description of HAC adjusted Major Diagnostic Category.

columns.name: HAC_ADJ_ROM_DESC
columns.description: Description of the HAC adjusted Risk of Mortality.

columns.name: HAC_ADJ_SOI_DESC
columns.description: Description of HAC adjusted Severity of Illness.

columns.name: RISK_OF_MORTALITY_DESC
columns.description: Description of the Risk of Mortality.

columns.name: SEVERITY_OF_ILLNESS_DESC
columns.description: Description of the Severity of Illness.

columns.name: PRICER_BASE_RATE
columns.description: Pricer data

columns.name: OVERALL_CLAIM_TYPE
columns.description: The description of the overall claim type.

columns.name: PAYMENT_ACTION
columns.description: The action for payment recommended by the pricer.

columns.name: TOTAL_CUTBACK_PAYMENT
columns.description: Total cutback payment.

columns.name: TOTAL_CUTBACK_PERCENT
columns.description: Total cutback percent.

columns.name: TOTAL_EXCLUDING_OUTLIERS_PMT
columns.description: Total excluding outliers payment.

columns.name: TTL_ITEM_PMT_SUBJ_TO_CUTBACK
columns.description: Total item payment subject to cutback.

columns.name: PPS_ASSOC_VEN_CONTRACT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the vendor contract associated with one communication with a PPS pricer.

columns.name: PPS_ASSOC_VEN_CONTRACT_ID_CONTRACT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Vendor-Network contract.

columns.name: PPS_USED_IN_PRICE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether a PPS data line is associated with the vendor contract that was used in the pricing of the claim at the time of adjudication. 1 indicates that the PPS data was used to price the claim. 2 indicates that the PPS data was not used to price the claim. Null indicates that there is no associated vendor contract or it is not known whether the PPS line was used for pricing.

columns.name: EDC_ANALYZER_FLAG
columns.description: Indicates whether the EDC Analyzer was run and results are available.

columns.name: MOE_FLAG
columns.description: Indicates whether the Medicaid Outpatient Editor was run and results are available.

columns.name: CALC_FLAG
columns.description: Indicates whether the Calculation Control program was run and results are available.

columns.name: FILE_NOT_FOUND
columns.description: Name of the missing program file.

columns.name: RAP_PENALTY_AMT
columns.description: Amount the total payment has been reduced by due to an untimely RAP submission.

columns.name: RAP_PENALTY_AMT_ALT
columns.description: Amount the alternate total payment has been reduced by due to an untimely RAP submission.

columns.name: PPR_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Potentially Preventable Readmissions adjustment amount.

columns.name: PPC_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Potentially Preventable Complications adjustment amount.

columns.name: EDITOR_RTN_TYPE
columns.description: Editor Return Code Type from incoming ACE editor using EasyGroup PPS Pricer.

columns.name: DB_SERVER_AND_INST
columns.description: Database server and instance used for processing from incoming ECB2 block using EasyGroup PPS Pricer.

columns.name: DB_NAME
columns.description: Database name used for processing from incoming ECB2 block using EasyGroup PPS Pricer.
